amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title) insert the following: SEC. ___. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used by the Executive Office for United States Attorneys (including the offices of United States attorneys), the United States Marshals Service, or employees of the Department of Justice, to carry out activities located at a newly constructed Federal courthouse located on a site between Broadway, Hill, First, and Second Streets in Los Angeles, California.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to provide services from or for the Executive Office for United States Attorneys, the United States Marshals Service, or employees of the Department of Justice, to carry out activities located at a newly constructed Federal courthouse located on a site between Broadway, Hill, First, and Second Streets in Los Angeles, California.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A059) offered by Mr. Denham.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Denham amendment (A059) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
